movies.title: Thomas & Friends: Animals Aboard!
movies.plot: All aboard as Thomas and his engine friends embark on exciting adventures with some new furry friends! Percy learns to be gentle when meeting some small forest friends and Thomas goes hog-wild trying to be Really Useful for Farmer Trotter. Henry performs a sweet deed in returning Sodor's special songbird and Thomas must fulfill a tall order when he is asked to deliver the newest animal to Sodor's Wildlife Center. The engines are busy as bees being Really Useful and helping animals big and small. Features the episodes: Percy's New Friends, Thomas and the Pigs, Henry's Good Deeds, Thomas' Tall Friend and Buzzy Bees.
movies.simplePlot: All aboard as Thomas and his engine friends embark on exciting adventures with some new furry friends! Percy learns to be gentle when meeting some small forest friends and Thomas goes ...

biography.bio: Michael Brandon was born on April 20, 1945 in Brooklyn, New York, USA as Michael Feldman. He is an actor and director, known for Thomas & Friends (1984), Captain America: The First Avenger (2011) and Dempsey and Makepeace (1985). He has been married to Glynis Barber since November 18, 1989. They have one child. He was previously married to Lindsay Wagner.
biography.name: Michael Brandon

biography.bio: Jules de Jongh is an actress, known for Mirror's Edge (2008), Skunk Fu! (2007) and Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit (2010). She is married to Pierre de Jongh.
biography.name: Jules de Jongh

biography.bio: Born in Montreal, William Hope joined the National Youth Theatre in London after high school and performed for three seasons with them. During that time he began training at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art (RADA). After graduation he worked almost uninterruptedly in theatre for the next seven years, in addition to over 100 radio plays for the BBC as a resident artist. In the mid 80's he was offered a major role in Stanley Kubrick's "Full Metal Jacket" but passed on it for a lead in James Cameron's Aliens (1986) as Lt. Gorman. The next ten years saw him regularly playing leading roles in many major regional, touring and West End companies, often living in London as a base for family, while he began working more extensively in front of the camera. The last five years, has seen him appearing in a wide mix of film and TV. His career to date includes art and indie films, mainstream international TV and numerous major Hollywood movies. This year will see him guest-starring in possibly the last series of "Spooks" (MI-5), performing alongside David Thewlis in Luc Besson's "The Lady", with Rachel Weisz in "The WhistleBlower" and Johnny Depp in Tim Burton's "Dark Shadows".
biography.name: William Hope

biography.bio: Togo Igawa is an actor/director living in England. He trained in Japan at The Haiyuza Theatre Company Acting School and Toho Gakuen College of Drama and Music. In 1986, he became the first Japanese actor to become a member of the Royal Shakespeare Company. His work spans stage, film, anime, games and television, including movie roles in "Incognito" (1998), "Memories of a Geisha" (2003), "The Last Samurai" (2005),"Night Train" (2009) and "47 Ronin" (2013). Since 2009, he has been the voice of Hiro, the wise Japanese train engine in "Thomas and Friends". In 2012, he was nominated for a BAFTA Games Award for his role in "Total War: Shogun 2" (2011). Mr. Igawa lives in north Oxfordshire, England with his wife Adrienne Baba.
biography.name: Togo Igawa

biography.bio: Kerry Shale is a North American actor, based in London, England since 1978. He has worked on stage in the West End and at the Royal National Theater as well as the Almeida, Hampstead, the Donmar Warehouse and the Royal Court theaters, appearing in plays by Garcia Lorca and Wallace Shawn, Neil Simon and Woody Allen. His first film was Barbra Streisand's Yentl. Recent work (2016) includes Undercover and New Blood (BBC TV) and Final Portrait (directed by Stanley Tucci).
biography.name: Kerry Shale

actors.character: Henry / Gordon / James / Sir Topham Hatt

biography.bio: Martin Sherman was born on November 28, 1966 in Evanston, Illinois, USA as Martin T. Sherman. He is an actor and director, known for Captain America: The First Avenger (2011), Green Street Hooligans (2005) and Thomas & Friends (1984).
biography.name: Martin Sherman

biography.bio: Keith Wickham is known for his work on Corneil and Bernie (2003), The Secret Show (2006) and Thomas & Friends (1984).
biography.name: Keith Wickham

biography.bio: Glenn Wrage is known for his work on Saving Private Ryan (1998), Running Scared (2006) and Mirror's Edge (2008).
biography.name: Glenn Wrage
